name: edit_file
description: Make surgical edits to a file using search/replace. Each edit finds an exact text match and replaces it. Fails if a search string is not found or matches multiple locations.

path.description: Absolute path to the file to edit

edits.description: List of search/replace operations to apply in order

search.description: Exact text to find in the file

replace.description: Text to replace the found text with
